SEARCH
Package view.menu

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
view.menu.Menu
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelMenu, MainMenu, Replays
public abstract class Menu extends Object
Abstract class for menus. This class provides unions structure of menu used in application.
Author:
